content: simple crochet holders with keychain attachments are all you need to hold all your favorite photo cards making full use of the colors in your red heart super saver brights super craft kit all versions are created using the same basic frame with different embellishments to create bunny heart frog strawberry and tiger versions it s a fun project for practicing chain single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet basic embroidery and more materials red heart® super saver® super craft kit™ brights set includes 12 balls 50 g/1 7 oz each 600 g/21 oz total yardage 93 yds/85 m each 1116 yds/1020 m total measurements to fit 2¼ x 3½ 5 5 x 9 cm photocard finished size approx 4 x 5 10 x 12 5 cm
